title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I want a review from you about a real make money online site which pays to translate text, transcript, remove background from images, etc.Like without any interview or anything like that, signup on website do simple work and get paid, site from which i can make about $2-$10 a day.

comments.author: Iron Fist
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on August 21, 2023, 09:22:44 AMI want a review from you about a real make money online site which pays to translate text, transcript, remove background from images, etc.Like without any interview or anything like that, signup on website do simple work and get paid, site from which i can make about $2-$10 a day. You can do all the stuff you talked about using AI tools for free now. I don't really get why anyone would want to pay for that. So, maybe focus on jobs that you're good at and aren't easily taken over by AI, like consulting, tutoring, creative gigs, and stuff like that.
